nycTheatreExcerpt: "Michael Arden's gorgeous staging makes the most of Dane Laffrey's multilevel sets behind sliding panels and George Reeve's floor-to-ceiling videos. As Oliver and Claire fall, it's easy to do the same for the show. No maybe about it Maybe Happy Ending has theatrical magic."
